mapper.select: SELECT b.boardID, b.employeeID, b.title ,TO_CHAR(b.creationDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS creationDate ,IFNULL((SELECT e.name FROM employee e WHERE e.employeeID = b.employeeID), '익명') AS name FROM board b WHERE isHidden = 0 AND isPinned = 0 AND category = #{param1} ORDER BY b.boardID DESC

SELECT b.boardID, b.employeeID, b.title ,TO_CHAR(b.creationDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS creationDate ,(SELECT e.name FROM employee e WHERE e.employeeID = b.employeeID) AS name FROM board b WHERE isHidden = 0 AND isPinned = 1 AND category = #{param1} ORDER BY b.boardID DESC

SELECT b.boardID, b.title, b.content, b.isPinned, b.isHidden, b.employeeID ,(SELECT e.name FROM employee e WHERE e.employeeID = b.employeeID) AS name ,TO_CHAR(creationDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS creationDate FROM board b WHERE boardID = #{param1}
SELECT (SELECT MIN(boardID) FROM board b WHERE category = #{param2} AND boardID > #{param1}) AS next ,(SELECT MAX(boardID) FROM board b WHERE category = #{param2} AND boardID < #{param1}) AS prev

SELECT c.commentID, c.content, c.employeeID ,(SELECT e.name FROM employee e WHERE e.employeeID = c.employeeID) AS name ,TO_CHAR(creationDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS creationDate FROM comment c WHERE c.isHidden = 0 AND c.boardID = #{param1}

SELECT c.commentID, c.content, c.employeeID ,(SELECT e.name FROM employee e WHERE e.employeeID = c.employeeID) AS name ,TO_CHAR(creationDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') AS creationDate FROM comment c WHERE c.commentID = #{param1}
